Text: The legion of Oliviers rush at Cid from all sides.
An army of regenerating monsters, huh...
And all he does is snicker.
and he obliterates the clones bearing down on him.
Cid's eyes shine with a bluish-purple light.
the horde of Oliviers crumbles away.
there is now an ebony sword.
How are you able to use magic?!
Cid's body thrumms with the bluish-purple energy.

This is magic in its most concentrated, visualized
form, honed to a level that exceeds imagination.
Its glimmer is stunning.

If this place drains any magic you try to use, then
all I need to do is thicken it until it's too dense
to be absorbed.
it took a bit of time,
There is no way it could have been simple.

Not even Aurora, widely referred to as a witch,
can do such a thing.
That should not be humanly possible...!
Nelson's face is frozen with fear.
Another wave of Olivier clones descend upon Cid.
However, Cid's ebony sword grows in length

Though Cid's sweeping slashes knock the clones away,
almost none of them have disappeared.

They block the blows with their holy swords, then go
back on the attack again and again.
These are nothing more than scarecrows—

No sooner has he said this than blood spills from his
wound.

So lemme get this straight...we need to draw the holy
sword, cut the chains, and destroy the core, right?

Despite being in the midst of a hopeless battle, Cid
seeks to confirm the plan with Aurora.
There is confusion in Aurora's voice as she answers.
Doing it all step-by-step is such a drag.
if I just blew it all up?
Bluish-purple magic traces a helix through the air.
